title: How to decide whether to buy a smart watch or a fitness tracker - Quora

response.answer_text: First you must decide which is more important; a device that connects to your phone that can double as a fitness trackera dedicated tracker that may or may not relay information like incoming calls and texts to your wristI much prefer a dedicated fitness tracker than a smart watch that has features I do not need and do not want. It would be like buying an expensive food processor that can do all sorts of things, when all you need is something to chop vegetables. It also explains why chefs use a knife in their kitchen.

There are different benefits with each. Think of it this way. When looking for a nice folding knife to go camping with and you see a single blade folding knife and you see a Swiss army knif with 32 different functions what do you decide to get? If all I want is a knife to do a simple thing and do it well I get the first one. Of I want to do many different things I get the Swiss. The same thing with the fitness tracker and the smart watch.
